title: Bungeecord服时装工坊导致掉线问题
author: 2776901795abc
txt_content:
最近服务器人数逐渐增多,想给服务器分个区,结果都搞好之后发现玩家在服务器里面按时装工坊的P键,直接掉线

下面是bc的报错

11:20:57 [严重] [Tsiga_xiaolu666] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [sqbb] - encountered exception
io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: readerIndex(0) + length(1) exceeds writerIndex(0): UnpooledSlicedByteBuf(ridx: 0, widx: 0, cap: 0/0, unwrapped: PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf(ridx: 2, widx: 2, cap: 64))

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
https://papermc.io/downloads#Waterfall
换这个核心试试 我这也有时装工坊 但是没有掉线的情况
